pages.text: $(item)Builder's Wands$() are good for building a wall, but when it comes to building the outline for the wall, $(item)Similsax Transtructors$() are an excellent complement. Based on where you click on the targeted block, they will use the same type of block to build out a line in that direction.

pages.title: Basic Similsax
pages.text: Durability: 199 $(br2)Max blocks placed: 15 out from the starting block
